actions.name: t
actions.description:
'track' - Begin tracking current project. Additional Available Options:

name:		'Name of project', creates a new project. If it includes spaces, be sure to encapsulate in quotes
use:		value is list number, switches 'current' project to that list item and starts tracking

actions.name: l
actions.description: 'list' - offers a selectable list; used for switching between existing projects

actions.name: record
actions.description: Open record in Visual Studio Code

actions.name: archive
actions.description:
Archive last month's record and generate a new record


=======================================

actions.name: T
actions.description: List times for the day, by date selection

actions.name: all
actions.description: list times by day breakdown using project selection

actions.name: edit
actions.description:
Select an entry to edit; Uses the pattern '0,9:00' where a comma seperates
			the 'from' and 'to' entries.  Note that '0' represents 'no change'
